colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,GSUM PA DGE BA BSNGO BA NI, RANG GI DGE SBYOR GYI NYAMS LEN SKABS YIN NA RANG GANG MOS KYI SMON LAM GZHAN 'DON PAS CHOG CING, SMON LAM THAMS KYI RGYAL PO BZANG SPYOD PA NI GAL CHE BAS NGES PAR 'DON LA, PHUN SUM TSOGS PA MNGA' BA SOGS KYIS BKRA SHIS DANG ME TOG 'THOR, DUS GSUM RGYAL BA THAMS CAD KYI NGO BO KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SHAR BTZONG KHA PA LA CHU MCHOD STONG 'BUL CHOG BSGRIGS GSAL BAR BKOD PA 'DI YANG DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG LA DGOS PA'I CHED DU, ,RJE GSER KHANG RIN PO CHE'I MDZAD PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN @005B 'JAM MGON BLA MA RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
